explanation: Funds are realigned to Operation and Maintenance, Army from the Defense Health Program (DHP) for the proper execution of a congressional program increase to DHP for the Health Professions Scholarship Program (HPSP) in the FY 2021 enacted budget. This program and the associated FY 2021 base funding were transferred to the Military Departments in accordance with the FY 2021 Secretary of Defense Memo, Department of Defense Reform Focus in 2020. This is a base budget requirement.
